column5: We are looking at trying to book our 2008 fishing trip --- just got back from this year's trip -- and we are looking at Camp Narrows Lodge on Rainy Lake. We are interested in a place where we can catch walleyes to eat with lots of smallmouth action. Anyone been to Camp Narrows Lodge? Would appreciate any information --- feel free to email me at [email protected] Thanks!
So far I have not had any response --- if anyone has a response, please email me if you had rather not post anything. Thanks!
Jack, You have at least one e-mail. Post again if you didn't get it. Nimstug
Been pretty slow on responses. Anyone have any info on Rainy Lake with respect to Smallies and Walleyes? Thanks, Tim
You may get more responses on fishingminnesota dot com. They have a Rainy Lake thread. Walleye Central is a great site, unfortunately there isn't much Rainy Lake specific info.
